title: If i have 7gb of Data, how many games of LoL will i be able to play?

embed.description: If i have 7gb of Data, how many games of LoL will i be able to play? General Discussion

body:
> 
Originally here: http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=87347
Simple question that i hope a Rioter can drop in and give the answer to, i tried sending support an email asking a few questions about this and he couldn't give me an answer so he just told me to go to the NA boards, i ain't going there lol.
Edit: Well **** lol
> 

Hey Oz Sammy,
if you have already the patched client that's TONS of games...
On average, a player of League of Legends only uses 100MB / Month for game data (excluding patches).

If you include the download, that's about 2/3 GB but still leaves you with plenty of games to play.

Hope this helps.

replies.body: I actually have to switch to mobile tethering to beat lag every so often and use PDANet to track my usage. On average, a usual ranked game (30-40min) takes about 30mb of download and 10mb of upload.
Yeah you will be able to play a LOT of games assuming you have the patcher installed already. gaming generally uses only about 30mb per hour of gaming.
